tidbits.title: Historical Richness
tidbits.description: Czechia is rich in history, with a wealth of architectural gems like Prague Castle, Charles Bridge, and well-preserved medieval towns such as Český Krumlov.

tidbits.title: Cultural Heritage
tidbits.description: The country has a vibrant cultural scene, celebrated for its classical music, renowned composers like Dvořák and Smetana, and a passion for theater and literature.

tidbits.title: Beer Tradition
tidbits.description: Czechia has a deep-rooted beer culture, producing world-famous brews like Pilsner Urquell and boasting the highest beer consumption per capita globally.
